name: Archon, Word
description: The Archon, Word is a Tiny Celestial creature known for its benevolent nature, often serving as a guardian or divine messenger. It has impressive abilities to assist allies during combat and is characterized by its radiant energy.
memorable: Its ability to share smite and enhance allies' attacks with radiant damage makes it a unique and effective support in battle.
goals: To assist allies in combat and serve as a divine messenger.
relations: Can be encountered with other celestial beings or divine entities.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or places of great goodness and light.
strengths: Moderate resistance to radiant damage, immunity to necrotic damage, and several conditions enhance its durability in combat.
weaknesses: Relatively low Armor Class of 13 and limited hit points make it vulnerable if engaged directly.
attacks: Slam deals radiant damage in melee; Forceful Words as a ranged spell attack; Share Smite empowers allies' attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Share Smite, allowing it to empower an ally's weapon to deal extra radiant damage.
senses: Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks related to sight due to Keen Sight.
skills: Excels in saving throws against spells and magical effects with +5 in Wisdom and Charisma.
additional_information: Does not require food, drink, or sleep due to Immortal Nature.
Can communicate in all languages and has telepathy within 60 feet.
Can cast spells without needing material or somatic components.
Possesses immunity to being charmed, frightened, poisoned, and prone.
Can outline targets in light with Faerie Fire, making them easier to hit.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like Dancing Lights, Message, True Strike, Faerie Fire, and Heroism to support allies.
